description: Kuroneko (real name: Gokou Ruri) enrolls in Kyousuke`s school, and Saori feels downhearted that she hasn`t heard from Kirino. Kyousuke notices that Ruri is having trouble making friends due to her personality, so he decides they should try a membership at their school`s Games Research club where the boy meets two other persons he never expected to be there as well.

titles.title: Ma disciple ne peut pas être aussi pourrie
Ore no Kouhai ga Konna ni Kusatteru Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Kouhai Can Be This Rotten
俺の後輩がこんなに腐ってるわけがない
